Class ColorEffectsShader

  • java.lang.Object

      • io.github.tomaso2468.rpgonline.post.ColorEffectsShader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PostEffect

    public class ColorEffectsShader
extends ShaderEffect
    A shader that effects the colours on the screen.
    Author:
    Tomaso2468
    See Also:
